title: Sri Lanka Army to introduce Teakwondo Martial Art to youths in the North
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma A grand show was displayed at the Alfred Duraiappah stadium last Sunday on 14 August to introduce teakwondo as a martial art to Jaffna youths by the Sri Lanka Army, Security Forces Headquarters- Jaffna. A special taekwondo show was performed by Korean teakwondo instructors and the sportsmen and women…
